question: People think that success in sports mainly depends on physical abilities while others think that there are other important factors. Discuss both sides and give your opinion.
text: It is often argued that to achieve landmarks in sports, you do not just need athletic talent, but also other basic factors, which underline the success. This essay will discuss both sides and my opinion would be clearly stated.

In order to make a mark, having a strong-built body is crucial in every field, and sports are not different. With ever demanding, you don't just need other skills, but need great stamina, to last long in the field. Many great athletes spend two to three hours in the gym, in order to perform well on the field. For instance, great sportsmen line Kohli, Ronaldo or LeBron, has one thing in common - they all have tremendous stamina and strength. Therefore, physical abilities play a crucial part in achieving success.

However, there are other factors that define outstanding achievement in sports, such as mental strength. Over the last decade or two, sports haven't just about physicality, but had moved towards grit and perseverance. With pressure from fans and to perform well, athletes need to be more aware and well-prepared. For example, in a cricket match, a player needs to be aware of the match situation and play with the opponent's mind, to dominate the game. So, determination and mental strength play an important role in building a complete sportsman.

In conclusion, physical abilities like stamina and strength play a significant role in success in sports. However, in my opinion, courage and resilience are key factors that determine outstanding performance in sports.
